title: Tuesday Post Show (05-10-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (05-10-22)
description:
Bobby on an awkward text message exchange he got from Kane Brown. Bobby shares another DM answering a question about people who pre-order his new kid’s book. Bobby also shares a funny punishment from a fantasy league. Another celebrity is getting an honorary degree. Amy had a fire mishap at her house. Bobby asks Amy about a TikTok that her daughter posted. We also get to the bottom of Amy claiming that she won a tennis tournament.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
